articles.title: Detroit Pistons sign center Justin Patton - MLive.com
articles.description: Pistons ink former 16th overall pick in what would be Troy Weaver's first transaction as the GM.
articles.content:
The Detroit Pistons announced they have signed center Justin Patton.
In nine NBA games, the 6-11 Creighton product has averaged 1.8 points and 1.2 rebounds. His most recent NBA game was with the Okl… [+883 chars]

articles.title: David Andrews gives measured take on Tom Brady's exit from Patriots - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: David Andrews knows it's difficult to lose teammates, especially one as important as Tom Brady, but he's fully aware that roster turnover is something everyone in the NFL has to deal with.
articles.content:
David Andrews is one of the most important players on the New England Patriots.
